## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [clone()](./blockly.utils.rect.clone.md) |  | Creates a new copy of this rectangle. |
|  [contains(x, y)](./blockly.utils.rect.contains.md) |  | Tests whether this rectangle contains a x/y coordinate. |
|  [createFromPoint(position, width, height)](./blockly.utils.rect.createfrompoint.md) | <code>static</code> | Creates a new Rect using a position and supplied dimensions. |
|  [equals(a, b)](./blockly.utils.rect.equals.md) | <code>static</code> | Compares bounding rectangles for equality. |
|  [getHeight()](./blockly.utils.rect.getheight.md) |  | Returns the height of this rectangle. |
|  [getWidth()](./blockly.utils.rect.getwidth.md) |  | Returns the width of this rectangle. |
|  [intersects(other)](./blockly.utils.rect.intersects.md) |  | Tests whether this rectangle intersects the provided rectangle. Assumes that the coordinate system increases going down and left. |
